summary: WENT TO GO USE MY BRAKES AND NOTICED THEY GOT REALLY HARD AND ALMOST HIT SOMEONE. I TOWED IT TO THE DEALERSHIP AND THEY SAID IT WAS A FAULTY VACUUM PUMP, BELT, ETC..I HAD ASKED IF THIS WAS RECALLED THEY SAID NO .TOLD ME IT WAS GOING TO BE 1600 TO FIX. I WENT HOME AND DID A LITTLE RESEARCH APPARENTLY THIS IS AN ISSUE. 2015 CHEVY 1500 65K MILES
